name: Centaur Warrunner
title: Bradwarden
lore: It's said that a centaur's strength comes from the fury of the sun. Bradwarden proved this with every charge.

hoofstomp.name: Hoof Stomp
hoofstomp.description: Slams the ground, stunning and damaging nearby enemies.

doubleEdge.name: Double Edge
doubleEdge.description: Centaur strikes a mighty blow, damaging both himself and the enemy.

retaliate.name: Retaliate
retaliate.description: Centaur's skin returns damage to attackers based on his strength.

stampede.name: Stampede
stampede.description: All allied heroes gain maximum movement speed and trample enemies for damage based on Centaur's strength.
